original_text: And when I looked, behold, an hand was sent unto me; and, lo, a roll of a book was therein;
korean_text: 내가 보니 보라 한 손이 나를 향하여 펴지고 보라 그 안에 두루마리 책이 있더라

sentences.original_text: behold, an hand was sent unto me
and, lo, a roll of a book was therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보라, 책 두루마리가 그 안에 있었더라
